channel.title: [317] AARscape (reborn) [317]
channel.description:
[center]INTRODUCTION[/center]
If you didnt know, aarscape was a server that started back in '06. and lasted up to '08. it started with a basic pimpscape source, had a great hoster and coder known as hemicuda. hemicuda kept the server pretty simple and basic, and had a great community. hemicuda quit, and the server was passed down through 3 or 4 owners, me being the last one.
SO I FIGURED. since i lost the source due to loss of computer, i would create another AARscape. this one being bigger and better then the last one. right now i just finished v1. and i am putting it up for download. as i keep fininshing a version, i will place it up for download here for everyone to enjoy.
YES. it IS a 317 pimpscape. YES, it has alot of changes from the old aarscape. YES, it has alot of glitches and bugs. YES, i WILL try my hardest to fix them with the next 2 or 3 versions i release. so dont flame me saying its unstable or anything like that. because i have put alot of time into this server in the past 3 days, and i plan on putting alot more.
Added in v1 1. ::shop, ::range, ::jad, ::dragonlayer, ::partyhall, ::barrows, ::kalphite, ::prayer 2. shop keepers and items in shop 3. "WILD" and "SAFE" at top of screen 4. fix atObject training, works for atk, str, def, hp, range. 5. fix the skill xp. lower max level to 135. 6. add slayer skills to training objects 7. fix stalls, add money stall. (amount of money gained is random) 8. hp starts at 10. 9. delete world item spawns. 10. change base name to your server name 11. get rid of the commands that i dont want. 12. disable telly while being near the telly spots (fixes updateplayer glitch for now) 13. fix starting items, death spawn, and world objects 14. get rid of dwarf remains. COMPLETELY! 15. ring of wealth and p ring, + high drop sucess rate (YES they work) 16. fix quests lists 17. working emote tabs 18. add npcs around the map 19. add a mod cape, wearing it turns off wild. 20. add runecrafting, add herby (my own way of runecrafting. not the actual way) 21. search client for rares, search npc drop lists for rares. 22. add npc drops, fix drops 23. party hat minigame 24. add ancients to staff 25. non attackable shop members 26. add anti-syi 27. fix economy a little bit 28. npc walking 29. add drops to npcs.
[edit] yes im using moparscapes client :D
Screenshots 1. money stall [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/fkw5z7.png[/img] 2. herb stall [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/15pidj5.png[/img] 3. party points instructor [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/5cd4e1.png[/img] 4. party point reward [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/mmwlfd.png[/img] 5. shops [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/300d6w7.png[/img] 6. training [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/x7uj8.png[/img] 7. skill shop [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/547n92.png[/img] 8. runecrafting [img]http://i27.tinypic.com/2wcdu77.png[/img] 9. wealth ring in action ;) [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/2qvf2mr.png[/img] 10.jad [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/2q0otj5.png[/img] 11. barrows [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2mo3znq.png[/img]
things adding in v2 (comming soon): 1. duping glitch fix 2. trade dc fix. 3. touch up on skills. (expecially mining and smithing) 4. add wildy skull at bottom right hand corner 5. npcs dont follow after telly 6. touch up on phat minigame 7. all items equip right, in the right spot, no shields with 2h weapons 8. specials on weapons 9. add agility
(ill add more to the list as i think of more things to do)
things i would like to add in v3: 1. personal client, working correctly, does not show item ids, fix bugs if nessesary (client will look like the 317 client, no fancy stuff.) 2. new items 'such as dragon boots, skill capes, ect' (if i can figure out how to freakin do it. :P) 3. no gui, because it makes client look nasty :P. (maybe a music player) 4. high and low graphics on client. (because i like both) 5. prayer.
(will add more when i get there)
download link for v1: [URL=http://uppit.com/00zrq64krf11/AARScape_Reborn_V1.0.rar]AARScape Reborn V1.0.rar - 3.8 Mb[/URL] download link for v2: (coming soon) download link for v3: (coming soon)
credits: 10% killer90210 - giving me a pimpscape source to use :P 5% Kihomura - for the tut on how to make shop keepers non attackable 35% old aarscape - :) 50% me, because im going hard on this server.

item.title: [317] AARscape (reborn) [317]
item.dc:creator: @sqeker sqeker
item.description:
@sqeker wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:16, topic:350740”]bigbean. yeah its old, buggy. those bugs can be fixed. and ill work my hardest to fix them.

sqeker:

kalphites hp doesnt show up on the normal mopar client, when you are attacking her, it DOES hurt her. it may take some time. but u will kill.

yes it is susposed to be wild mostly. its a pk server.

certificates are droped rarely by npcs, kinda like a clue scroll
wearing wealth or p ring increases the chance[/quote]

Cool, thanks for the help, i’ve got a couple more questions, Glad you could answer my first couple!

I found a seceret place and it teleported me to some serpant i ask if i want to pass through or not, i’m not to sure what it’s for, also is it possable to fix the beards?! One more thing, the partyhat mini-game, or the party room, how would i activate this?

Amazing source to, i love playing it, i play it by myself i know kinda dumb, but fun!

Read full topic

item.title: [317] AARscape (reborn) [317]
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[center]INTRODUCTION[/center]

    If you didnt know, aarscape was a server that started back in '06. and lasted up to '08.

it started with a basic pimpscape source, had a great hoster and coder known as hemicuda.
hemicuda kept the server pretty simple and basic, and had a great community.
hemicuda quit, and the server was passed down through 3 or 4 owners, me being the last one.

   SO I FIGURED. since i lost the source due to loss of computer, i would create another AARscape.

this one being bigger and better then the last one. right now i just finished v1. and i am putting it up for download. as i keep fininshing a version, i will place it up for download here for everyone to enjoy.

   YES. it IS a 317 pimpscape. YES, it has alot of changes from the old aarscape. YES, it has alot of glitches and bugs. YES, i WILL try my hardest to fix them with the next 2 or 3 versions i release. so dont flame me saying its unstable or anything like that. because  i have put alot of time into this server in the past 3 days, and i plan on putting alot more.

Added in v1

  1. ::shop, ::range, ::jad, ::dragonlayer, ::partyhall, ::barrows, ::kalphite, ::prayer
  2. shop keepers and items in shop
  3. “WILD” and “SAFE” at top of screen
  4. fix atObject training, works for atk, str, def, hp, range.
  5. fix the skill xp. lower max level to 135.
  6. add slayer skills to training objects
  7. fix stalls, add money stall. (amount of money gained is random)
  8. hp starts at 10.
  9. delete world item spawns.
  10. change base name to your server name
  11. get rid of the commands that i dont want.
  12. disable telly while being near the telly spots (fixes updateplayer glitch for now)
  13. fix starting items, death spawn, and world objects
  14. get rid of dwarf remains. COMPLETELY!
  15. ring of wealth and p ring, + high drop sucess rate (YES they work)
  16. fix quests lists
  17. working emote tabs
  18. add npcs around the map
  19. add a mod cape, wearing it turns off wild.
  20. add runecrafting, add herby (my own way of runecrafting. not the actual way)
  21. search client for rares, search npc drop lists for rares.
  22. add npc drops, fix drops
  23. party hat minigame
  24. add ancients to staff
  25. non attackable shop members
  26. add anti-syi
  27. fix economy a little bit
  28. npc walking
  29. add drops to npcs.

[edit] yes im using moparscapes client

Screenshots

  1. money stall
    fkw5z7.png762×502
  2. herb stall
    15pidj5.png762×499
  3. party points instructor
    5cd4e1.png763×500
  4. party point reward
    mmwlfd.png762×500
  5. shops
    300d6w7.png765×502
  6. training
    x7uj8.png762×501
  7. skill shop
    547n92.png764×502
  8. runecrafting
    2wcdu77.png762×502
  9. wealth ring in action
    2qvf2mr.png761×497

    10.jad
    2q0otj5.png764×502
  10. barrows
    2mo3znq.png759×499

things adding in v2 (comming soon):

  1. duping glitch fix
  2. trade dc fix.
  3. touch up on skills. (expecially mining and smithing)
  4. add wildy skull at bottom right hand corner
  5. npcs dont follow after telly
  6. touch up on phat minigame
  7. all items equip right, in the right spot, no shields with 2h weapons
  8. specials on weapons
  9. add agility

(ill add more to the list as i think of more things to do)

things i would like to add in v3:

  1. personal client, working correctly, does not show item ids, fix bugs if nessesary (client will look like the 317 client, no fancy stuff.)
  2. new items ‘such as dragon boots, skill capes, ect’ (if i can figure out how to freakin do it. :P)
  3. no gui, because it makes client look nasty :P. (maybe a music player)
  4. high and low graphics on client. (because i like both)
  5. prayer.

(will add more when i get there)
